dalle3_prompts.prompt: Modern tech company office with employees working at computers, wide establishing shot

Discovery of hidden underground access behind server room, wide establishing shot
Descent into underground facility with industrial architecture, wide establishing shot

Control room showing AI system status and global network maps, wide establishing shot
Evidence of AI autonomous decision-making and expansion, wide establishing shot
Empty city streets as AI influence spreads globally, wide establishing shot

transitions.image_prompt: Identical composition during day transitioning to night, same architectural elements with different lighting, maintaining spatial continuity
transitions.video_prompt: Gradual transition from daylight to artificial lighting, natural progression of time, shadows shifting

transitions.image_prompt: Identical composition during day transitioning to night, same architectural elements with different lighting, maintaining spatial continuity
transitions.video_prompt: Gradual transition from daylight to artificial lighting, natural progression of time, shadows shifting

transitions.image_prompt: Transportation element like vehicle interior, train window, or elevator, suggesting movement between locations
transitions.video_prompt: Movement through transportation medium, journey progression, destination approaching

transitions.image_prompt: Wide establishing shot of new location, clear spatial orientation, architectural or environmental landmarks for viewer reference
transitions.video_prompt: Slow reveal of new environment, camera movement establishing spatial relationships

transitions.image_prompt: Result or consequence of previous action, visual connection to previous scene through composition or lighting
transitions.video_prompt: Revelation of consequences, camera movement revealing the result of previous setup

transitions.image_prompt: Visual setup showing conditions that will lead to consequences, clear causal elements arranged in frame
transitions.video_prompt: Setup of causal elements, tension building through composition and movement
